title: Will using Quora regularly help me to become a better writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can benefit as a writer by using Quora. Here are a few ideas about how regular use of this platform can help you to become better at writing. Subscribe to the Writing topic thread, and related topics. Many questions and answers on writing will appear in your personal Quora feed (from your email digest or home link).Follow some of the many Quora members who are successful writers. You will see all their answers in your Quora feed.Ask any questions you have about writing. You should receive plenty of useful advice in your replies.Try to answer several questions every week. The act of writing on any topic which you find of interest will become good regular practice for you as a writer.View the answers in your Quora feed to find examples of good writing. You should also be able to identify some errors which you need to avoid in your own writing.Some of these answers to questions about writing may also help: What qualities do I need to be a good writer?What is your best advice for an amateur non-fiction writer for his first work?Is it harder to write a fictional novel or a non-fictional book?Does the use of too much imagery in a write-up make you cringe?

It depends on how you will utilize this app or website. You will always learn something from anything. It's not only how it will help you, but also how you are, say, dealing with it, or using, or seeing it. Actually, there are a lot of helpful things here you can find on Quora about writing. Also, you might also find something about the things you want to write. Studying in university or attending seminars might be the best thing, they would say, but communities like this can also help you grow.
